review: It's awesome I can watch my program I was watching on my iPad on my tv now! No more charging I just leave it plugged in and any time I have free time I am using it

review: I have the Amazon TV, Apple TV and the Fire Stick and I honestly like them all. I was a little disappointed that the stick has to stay plugged up the entire time. I thought it would be less bulky.

review: Ridiculously easy to set up. Worth every penny.
